means: 戊脉安，异搏定（一种冠状动脉扩张药）

word_mean: 维拉帕米：钙通道阻滞剂，可使冠状动脉扩张，心肌需氧量减低，用于心绞痛的防治，静脉注射治疗室上性快速型心律紊乱

sentence.Network_en: Cytotoxicity of Nef , dichlorvos ( DDVP ) and verapamil ( Ver ) were tested by MTT method in RBE 4 cells.
sentence.Network_cn: 采用MTT法了解Nef、敌敌畏 ( dichlorvos,DDVP ) 和维拉帕米 ( verapamil, Ver ) 对RBE4细胞的毒性作用.

sentence.Network_en: Excess salt induced PVR, which was prevented by verapamil in broiler chickens.
sentence.Network_cn: 高盐诱发了肉鸡PVR, 维拉帕米显著抑制了高盐对PVR的 诱发作用.

sentence.Network_en: Results: The total effective rate of verapamil was 94 %.
sentence.Network_cn: 结果: 维拉帕米治疗室上性心动过速总有效率94%.

derivation.yuyuan_name: 1960s: from v(al)er(onitr)il(e) (from valeric acid + nitrile), with the insertion of -apam- (of unknown origin)

means.word_mean: 1. a drug (trade names Calan and Isoptin) used as an oral or parenteral calcium blocker in cases of hypertension or congestive heart failure or angina or migraine
